subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] More from the old RS [4 Attachments]
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_00B4_01C9C261.16BDE610
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

If I had the chance to test one of your machines, I wouldn't do that. I don=
't really care about that part of it. I just want to prove legitimate, spir=
it communication if I can. If I was testing the box, and I didn't get what =
I considered to be spirit communication, I also wouldn't call it a loss eit=
her. Just because I can't get anything, doesn't mean it can't work for some=
one else, under different circumstances. The worse I would ever say was tha=
t my results were inconclusive. I have heard it working for you, so I know =
it is possible, therefore I could never disprove it.

That wasn't meant to =
be a hint or anything, I am just sayin'.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
 From: Frank Sumption 
  To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com ; grassharp@yahoogroup=
s.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, April 21, 2009 8:59 AM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] More fr=
om the old RS [4 Attachments]


  [Attachment(s) from Frank Sumption includ=
ed below] 



    I wouldn't withhold my stuff out of meanness, but I'm tir=
ed of feeling manipulated by all these "researchers" out making all kinds o=
f stupid claims about my stuff. 

   F-S

  
------=_NextPart_000_00B4_01C9C261.16BDE610
